author: Lauren Lantry
title: Medicare and Medicaid patients get access to telemedicine, but challenges remain
description: Medicare and Medicaid patients were given temporary authorization to use telehealth services amid the coronavirus pandemic.
content: On Monday, President Donald Trumps administration took the unprecedented step to temporarily waive rules for the nation's largest insurer -- Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) -- giving some healthcare providers the ability to have phone-only … [+12752 chars]
